answerText: Hermann Hesse[10] This Hesse novel is about a young Indian who goes to study with the Buddha. The title of this novel and its protagonist refers to the real name of the historical Buddha before he achieved enlightenment.
heading: MUT |2012 | 3 | 19 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The protagonist of one novel by this man gets bullied by Franz Kromer before meeting Max Demian. For 10 points each: [10] Name this author, who wrote another novel about Harry Haller, who reads a pamphlet about a "magic theater" intended "for madmen only," and also encounters the mysterious saxophonist Pablo.
